title: Is remembering death part of the Sunnah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: muhammad from the philippines is remembering death part of the sunnah the answer is yes the authentic hadith of the prophet is remember death frequently and make that a habit because whenever you are in poverty it would make life so happy and wide because death is even worse and whenever you're wealthy and in prosperity it would tighten life because you know that all of this prosperity is going to come to end and i'm going to die death reminds you of allah azzawajal and it reminds you of what you are doing at the moment whether it's and what would your fate be accordingly so definitely it is part of the sunnah
